website_summaries.verdict: Treats a variety of fungal conditions and leaves skin feeling clean and fresh.
pros: Many users remark on how well this product works on different fungal conditions
Gets skin clean without being too hard on sensitive skin
Many also liked the scent and amount of lather
Gentle enough for children over age 3
cons: May not work for all skin issues
A few felt it wasn't as effective on odor as other brands

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Body and Foot Wash.
customer_reviews.text: The product I received today is NOT Body and Foot Wash as pictured. The product I received is plain Body Wash. The listed ingredients are VERY different from the ingredients listed with the pictured product. This is completely misleading and bait and switch. If I had known that the product was not as pictured I would have purchased a different product more suited to my needs. The body wash is ok, it's simply NOT the product you think you are buying. I call that dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: Civil Servant

customer_reviews.title: ultra-refreshing cleansing wash made with natural plant oils
customer_reviews.text: ArtNaturals Tea Tree Body and Foot Wash is an ultra-refreshing concentrated cleanser that lathers with ease and leaves your skin soft and pliant. The scent is invigorating and awakens your senses. I chose this product for the natural antiseptic, anti:germ, and anti:fungal properties of tea tree, peppermint and eucalyptus and other essential oils. This is truly a quality personal care product that can be used by both women and men. This product is cruelty-free (important to me).
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fresh smell, lots of suds, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on it being natural and possibly helping with mild jock rash. Due to my job, I have to wear clothes that make me sweat a lot. This worked well to clear up my rash and worked well on my feet too. Leaves a nice, fresh smell and my skin didn't need a lot of lotion afterwards. When I ran out, I tried another type of natural body wash and although it smelled nice, my rash returned. I used this afterwards and it went away. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Martin

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash! The smell of the Tea Tree, and the tingle of the Pepermint and Eucalyptus is amazing! The wash made me feel invigorated. The bottle is a good size for the price, and a little goes a long way; I ended up using this quicker, because I added to my bath - for an enticing scent for my bath. I think you will like the product!
customer_reviews.author: Superwmn

customer_reviews.title: No more athlete’s foot!
customer_reviews.text: Tea Tree. I originally purchased this when I was having a problem with athlete’s foot. After applying a topical anti fungal cream to cure the problem, I have been using this soap for maintenance and I haven’t had a problem since !!! The fragrance is pleasant, not too strong. I also use this for the rest of my body without a problem. Lasts long. Does not sud. I’m not left feeling super duper squeaky clean. Skin just feels nice. So I guess that means it’s not drying me out so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Lauraine

customer_reviews.title: I have been struggling and finally found a product that helped soothe as well as bring down any painful swelling around the areas of inflammation
customer_reviews.text: This has helped my back acne so much! I have been struggling and finally found a product that helped soothe as well as bring down any painful swelling around the areas of inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Thi C

customer_reviews.title: BAIT AND SWITCH - CHEAP INGREDIENTS! Not accurate description. Contains what it says to avoid
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This used to be an amazing product. It no longer contains the original formulation and instead is chalked full of synthetic colorants, cheap foaming agents and other preservatives. (This explains why the price decreased!) Go find a new wash if you used to like this one, this is no longer the same product. Shame on ArtNaturals for theiur Bait and Switch Tactics
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T.

customer_reviews.title: Just regular body wash
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing product. Can’t really smell any of the oils that well. This actually lathers and feels like regular body wash sold at a higher price just because they’ve added tiny amounts of natural oils to it. I’ve purchased tea tree oil body washes from other sellers that smell much better and feel more natural. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: KT-amazon

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS SULFATES!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok folks, if your looking for Sulfate free products, this is not the brand. Keep looking. Amazon, ArtNaturals website and the bottle labeling show "sulfate free". THIS IS FALSE. It is listed as the 2nd ingredient. Please see other buyers pictures. I got my bottle March 25, 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can’t get enough of this stuff
customer_reviews.text: So I work in a hospital with all possible infections around you at all times. It’s nice to get home and have a good scrub down with this stuff. It leaves you a little dry but adding lotion after you are clean works great. And I know I’m clean. I used other brands in the past but it left me feeling oily and I didn’t feel as clean. This stuff is great. I purchased 4 so far and will purchase more as I need it. Smells so great and not too bad of a price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny M

customer_reviews.title: Yummy scent! So clean smelling!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a temporary freak out moment last month when this was no longer available for purchase. I was ELATED when it became available to buy again! I bought several bottles in case it happens again where it becomes unavailable. I buy this for the fact that it’s made with natural ingredients, and all of the YUMMY, fresh, minty essential oils that are in it! I feel so clean after using this!
customer_reviews.author: Jamine & Moriah White

customer_reviews.title: NOT Sulfate free!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this based off of reviews and ingredients. They have changed the formula without updating the product. I am sensitive to sulfates and didn’t realize it wasn’t sulfate free until after I had already used it. Go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew P.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. The bottle was bigger than I exptected. It smells great and leaves my skin feeling clean and fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie

customer_reviews.title: Contains Sulfates
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. The description and image the seller placed contains an ingredients list that is not accurate to the product you receive in the mail. Compare my photo to that on the product listing. My photo contains “Sodium laureth sulfate” which is...not natural and is horrible for your skin.
customer_reviews.author: brokecollegestudent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this wash! Bought to help with eczema and acne, it helped!
customer_reviews.author: Marn

customer_reviews.title: Not consistent in availability and pricing.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a while. Problem was the price would fluctuate. It wouldn't always be in stock. I switched to a more reliable brand and am much happier!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Delightful & Stays off Breakouts
customer_reviews.text: Purely delightful and cleaning feeling from this product. Great for post work out showers.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Like a Spa
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash. It smells so fresh and clean, and it really seems to get the job done. We have a lot of skin issues in our house. I work in an industry where I am constantly shaking hands (and getting exposed to ringworm). I initially purchased the body wash as a preventative measure for that, but it's also taken care of acne issues in the house. It also smells absolutely wonderful--my husband says it makes him think of a spa. Not only does it make us feel clean, it also opens our lungs up. There is nothing not to love about this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle F

customer_reviews.title: Odor Eliminator!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a body wash in some specific locations that sometimes have a more pungent odor than the rest of me. It works like a charm! The smell is very pleasant and soothing. The scent intensity is perfect to me, not too strong, not too weak, but it might be strong for some who have a sensitivity to herbal or peppermint scents (especially if smelling from the bottle), but it gets very subtle after application and rinsing. A little goes a long way and it works so well, I don't have to apply it daily, just as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great for teenage girls and boys that are really active in sports.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Not thin consistency like most other body wash. Refreshing scent that makes you feel clean without the extra "perfumey" ingredients. Liked it so much that I had to get the larger size next time I got it. Recommended to family and friends that have teenage boys. They loved it as well 😃
customer_reviews.author: Tonie

customer_reviews.title: Something finally that doesnt dry my skin out, and the smell great.
customer_reviews.text: This is great...something final that doesnt dry my skin out. It smells wonderful. It just makes you feel bacterial free and super clean. Again, I just love the smell...it awakens your senses. JUST LIKE GOOD MORNING IM HERE.......... This is my 5th time buying. I wish they sold in larger bottle to pour into smaller decoration bottle or just plain bottle will do nicely.
customer_reviews.author: BLONDIE-POP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Anti-Fungal Liquid Soap
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic treatment for athlete’s feet, and other trouble areas. It can also be used on insect bites and poison ivy, to guard against secondary infections from scratching at itchy spots. I’m never without it in the shower. It isn’t moisture rich and can be irritating on dry, flaky skin, so use with caution, particularly in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: G. Frisby

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for eczema!
customer_reviews.text: I have bad eczema and generally itchy skin. I also suffer from dermatillomania (skin picking). All of that together equals red, inflamed, and itchy skin. I needed something that both didn’t irritate my skin AND was an anti-fungal. This body wash was PERFECT. It helped so much to soothe my skin and make it healthier. It smells great too! Highly recommended for anyone but especially anyone with itchy skin!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Feet will feel great
customer_reviews.text: This product really works on my feet. It smells great and lathers very nicely. It works on the body has well and is all natural.
customer_reviews.author: andrewzindar

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: This is no longer the same product as advertised. I’ve bought this four times before this fifth time and it was excellent for anti-fungal use. No sulfates. Now it seems they have done a bait and switch; the product info here reflects the original ingredients and label; the one you get mentions nothing about fungal treatment or being sulfate free. It’s rather disappointing to be honest I’ve been using this for four years and could say it was a quality product, now it’s like buying Oldspice body wash and adding mint and watered down tea tree oil. If you’re looking for anti fungal properties look elsewhere, this is definitely not the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Superduper75

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and effective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wash primarily as a foot wash to use after going to the gym, and to keep my feet feeling and smelling fresh throughout SoCal's extra long sandal season. It works wonderfully well for both purposes as well as for an overall body wash. My favorite aspect is the natural tea tree oil which acts as an antifungal - I'm super paranoid about getting athlete's foot with the abundance of heat and frequent gym visits - and my feet have stayed pristine in the 4 or so years since I've been using this wash. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: This body wash is awesome. It smells devine, but then I love mint and eucalyptus. It lathers and rinses very nicely, and leaves your skin soft. Also gives you a cool feeling when you get out of the shower, so on hot humid summer days, this would be great. I wish it came in bigger bottles.
customer_reviews.author: JAG51

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: So, I have been looking for the perfect peppermint body wash for a while. The Artnaturals Tea Tree Body Wash has a nice clean, refreshing scent. It does not leave my skin dry like most of the others I've tried. The Artnaturals actually moisturizes my skin. And it makes me feel super clean. I love it! If it came in a bigger bottle it would be even better!
customer_reviews.author: St. Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Item not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had much of the stuff in it the description said it did not have and which should be avoided. Pretty much the opposite of how it was described. Smelled really good, but now I am suspicious the scent was fake, too. :(
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing cleanser for deep cleaning-on my 3rd bottle
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my 3rd bottle. This is very moisturizing. The other tea tree products I’ve used, have been fairly harsh and drying. It’s good for teenagers, feet and anything else you think you need tea tree for...after hot yoga. Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: Carrie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great against skin fungal infections
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended this by a co-worker and it works great. Ringworm is in the soil here, and the cats track it into the house where I would get patches of it on my legs. Using this soap is a deterrent and it stops the fungus. Where before using OTC anti-fungal creams would take up to two weeks to see the patches dry up, not only does this soap dry up the patches in days, it also helps to keep the fungus from coming back. If you are susceptible to fungal infections, get this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Perreault

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and Gentle
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. It smells good, is gentle on my sensitive skin and I come out of the shower with softer, cleaner, skin compared to the “Dove: Sensitive Skin” wash I was using before. I looked forward to showering today knowing it would sooth and moisturize my whole body. It feels great. However, it is a bit pricey, for some reason I thought I was getting two bottles for the price I paid. Not sure why I thought that now.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Sulfate Free Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this body wash for the first time a few weeks ago, and I am pleased with it. It has a nice lather. It does not dry out my skin and the tea tree oil/eucalyptus smell is a wonderful way to start the day. I didn't buy it for the purpose of fungal treatment, but as a daily wash it suits me very well, and my skin feels clean all day. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, Very helpful for rash, itchy skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It may be considered a little strong by some but I like the tingle I get from the bubbles. It smells good, and I dot like overly strong scented soaps. This is a great product and really helps with itchy skin. I highly recommend at least trying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth Trying!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best body wash/tea tree soap I have ever tried. Does not dry out your skin and smells amazing. It is also very healing to any kind of rash or skin condition. It is deffinetly worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Tango77

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing fragrance !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent of this body wash. Feels fresh after using it in shower. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Ordered this and really like it. Helps with any type of itchy skin because it’s antifungal and pretty soothing in my opinion. I noticed my sweat doesn’t smell and I definitely don’t sweat as much. I should mention that it’s not drying either, skin stays soft. I’ll reorder and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: AustinChic

customer_reviews.title: Tea tree-licious
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this body wash for the natural ingredients listed on the product. I read that tea tree is one of the best essential oils for bacteria and fungus so it would be a great addition to body wash. I loved the scent of the body wash and felt really clean after it's use without any weird "film" My skin wasn't dehydrated after use like how most soaps /body wash will leave your skin. Overall I was pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE"
customer_reviews.text: "Sodium Lauryl Sulfate" as one of the first ingredients? That is really really bad! If I have seeing it I would not have bought!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenating
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this product. Good for people in the South that prespire a lot! Use weekly!
customer_reviews.author: Nona Leanne Vestal

customer_reviews.title: Rashes go away in no time.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product as a body wash and have noticed my body odor has become non-existent, my rashes, and other skin irritations have gone away. I try to use this product at least 2-3times a week, however if I feel like my skins getting irritated or a small rash appears I immediately shower and apply this wash and it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Amber Caulboy

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite body wash. The smell is amazing. I use it on my kids as well. It’s all natural and doesn’t leave any residue. It’s great after a workout or run. A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: 3 out 3 bottles came with the plastic seals either completely off or just barely hanging on. Bottle did not smell like the 1 st bottle I had either.. don’t trust it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazingme

customer_reviews.title: Talk about feeling squeeky clean...
customer_reviews.text: Send was not overwhelming like other natural products, specifically body washes. I honestly don't think I have ever been so clean and my life! Thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this more!!! I add it to my daughters bath and she never wants to get out. It is so refreshing. The smell of the tree tea oil is strong, but not overwhelming at all. My skin feels so refreshed after using it.
customer_reviews.author: gwacemom

customer_reviews.title: Good body wash
customer_reviews.text: I like this body wash, it smells good and makes my skin feel smooth and refreshed. I am a fan of this brand after testing this out and the shampoo and conditioner. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn West

customer_reviews.title: Very good wash
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it. It's a little pricey, but you do get a great wash out of it. it smells great and the oils and peppermint feels really fresh on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine R.

customer_reviews.title: I love the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It does not dry my skin out and I love the smell. I used up my other bottle and needed more.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: amazing smell!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of essential oils and this body wash just makes me feel so invigorated when I use it. It is very refreshing and I feel like washing my entire apartment with it. the smell is strong if you aren't used to it, but not at all unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Favourite Soap Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great smelling and lathers up excellently. You can feel the oil suttley - it lathers, cleans and deodorizes great and washes of without any residue. Luxurious and will certainly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RICH G

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I love the scent. I use this mainly as a body wash and occasionally a face wash but it can be drying. Smells great and a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Helping with face acne
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son as an acne face wash. His face is looking better and he says he sees an approvement as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Coan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, clean scent; isn't dehydrating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I had dermatitis and wanted a cleanser that would calm my skin. This did the trick. Nice scent and not overly drying on the skin. I don't know whether it works well as an anti-fungal, but this product works well for me and my skin needs.
customer_reviews.author: S Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this body wash and have purchased it several times. I have sensitive skin. This smells great and it's antiseptic properties help my skin be much happier than before.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Owen

customer_reviews.title: Luxury in a bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is luxurious! I couldn’t find my normal one I buy with prime, so When K found the post for this... Happy Purchaser for sure. My skin is so soft. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I use this everyday and am very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand of body wash since it became available on Amazon. It smells fresh and clean, and I feel very refreshed after showering with it. The peppermint and tea tree oil are great early morning wake up scents. I use this as my shampoo to control dandruff and it works very well. I am very interested in learning what other products this manufacturer makes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lange

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and doesn't dry out your skin.
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying them all and this one I like the best, but I wish it came in a bigger bottle with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would smell minty and fresh but instead it honestly smells like motor oil. It doesn't give you a invigorating clean feeling either, just overall, meh. Wish I would've bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: kristy

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I like the product smells good doesn’t leave a soapy residue I would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the smell and feel of this product. However, they now use sulfates in it, which is upsetting and misleading when looking at their "sulfate free" infographic and description.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful thereputic properties.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several times. The benefits are amazing. Love the thereputic properties. My husband and myself are completely sold and spoiled with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Blk Widow

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this product. Definitely will be purchasing again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Lincoln Parker

customer_reviews.title: It does wait says no more fungal or bacteria
customer_reviews.text: It works immediately, no more itching, the fresh smell wakes you up. Before the one in use is 3/4 down I buy another
customer_reviews.author: ALHV

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several years and it is my favorite body wash of all time. I have psoriasis and both of the varieties are mild and effective with a nice refreshing scent. I prefer the Tea Tree, Peppermint and Eucalyptus Oil and feel cleaner after using it in comparison to the other scent (can't remember the name of that one).
customer_reviews.author: amays

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Great smell, but the bottle broke and had to throw it away. Did not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I  LOVE this body wash!
customer_reviews.text: This body wash is amazing. I use it after a long day at the gym for sore muscles. I feels good, smells good and the price is pretty fair. I'm super cheap but I will be spending the $14 to buy this soap again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: This was so good. It smelled amazing too! It didn't last longer than a month though. The bottle was smaller than I was expecting but nonetheless, it is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I liked the scent and felt clean and fresh afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: Good Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: For a “cleaner” body wash, the tea tree version works great. We had no complaints. The scent was refreshing and not overpoweringly heavy. I would purchase from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Dandi Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Cleared Shoulder Acne!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually sent to me on accident! But after trying to get ahold of Amazon to ship it back, I finally gave up and kept it. I reordered it several times since!! I have mild shoulder acne in the summer, and it really helped keep my skin clear. It also has a really pleasant but not over powering yet clean smell. I like the fact that it gets sudsy with just a little product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon showing its balls
customer_reviews.text: Was ok for the value of 11+ bucks now it’s 14+ . Amazon is showing its Predatorial sales, going to buy local moving forward 🤜💥🤛
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this body wash. Lots of bubbles, it has a great smell, and it leaves me feeling clean
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Smells good feels good looks good.
customer_reviews.text: This smells great and is pretty good to the skin, I’ve been using it for almost a month or so but I haven’t seen any dramatic difference or any amazing benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It smells great and makes my skin feel soft. I bought this soap to help with my hidradenitis suppurativa. I put a small bit on the inflammation under my arms and do a cool rinse. It soothes and cools the area which is a big relief especially in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, perfect for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I started using this as a body & face wash because I am sensitive to soaps and laundry detergents. This stuff smells great and lasts pretty long even though I use it every day. I love it and have noticed it doesn’t make my skin dry like other soaps do. I only wish they sold it in a bigger size so I don’t have to purchase it as often.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the products over all! They do not test on animals which is a plus and it is good for the environment. I only stopped buying it because a friend of mine sells a product (through Amway) that is also Animal/Environmental Friendly too. I like Amazon but I will always support my friends when I can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Nice soap with a nice lather, soft scent not overwhelming. My husband really liked the scent that it was natural smelling not toxic perfume.
customer_reviews.author: BrigieBoo

customer_reviews.title: Average At Best
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like it. The other stuff I buy was out so I tried this. Weaker smell. Seemingly weaker formula. Not as effective. Opted to not put a video of me showering on here....
customer_reviews.author: Finnegan And Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Looooove it
customer_reviews.text: The very best most luxurious body wash I have ever used, and I’ve used soooo many others.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesnowda

customer_reviews.title: Bubbly
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent it is super relaxing! I also use it for bubble baths and it makes the best bubbles!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cotaya

customer_reviews.title: Like Paul Mitchell’s Tea Tree Special shampoo?
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. It is like Paul Mitchell’s Tee Tree Special Shampoo fragrance but can enjoy it in a body wash.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia French

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash. It smells and feels amazing. A little goes a long way, too!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: smells good and lathers well though
customer_reviews.text: didnt seem to help with my skin. smells good and lathers well though. did notice my skin was a little itchy after using this though. probably good for other skin problems but didn't do anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: kmp66

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works effectively and smells good too. I have ordered this item 3 times.
customer_reviews.author: SportsPlayer

customer_reviews.title: No more itchy winter skin!
customer_reviews.text: During the winter my skin gets very dry and itchy. Since using ArtNaturals tea tree body wash I no longer feel itchy. A little goes a long way, lathers nicely, and rinses well. I will purchase this again when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Daffy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was amazing ! My dermatologist actually recommended using a body wash with tea tree oils in it for issues with fungal infections acquired at the gym. This body wash not only helped my skin, but it smells amazing!! It leaves you feeling clean and refreshed without all the harsh chemicals of traditional store bought washes.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great find. It is very effective, smells nice and lasts a long time. I like this brand.
customer_reviews.author: RSM585

customer_reviews.title: Body Wash
customer_reviews.text: I have bad rashes on my skin and this product keeps it from spreading and itching.
customer_reviews.author: it won't stop the music won't shut up

customer_reviews.title: A bit deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The photo of this bottle is very deceiving looks a lot bigger then what you get! But this is great soap just wish I had more product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Warneckr

customer_reviews.title: A very good wash for toe fungus and b bacteria
customer_reviews.text: A very good wash for toe fungus and b bacteria. Works and heals in a few washes. Just lather affected area and wash or use as directed on label.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Khan

customer_reviews.title: Clean and natural.
customer_reviews.text: Remarkably natural scent that left a moisturized clean feeling. The viscousity is relatively thick which makes it easy to handle and great for a loofa. As someone who has dealt with lots of allergies in the past this product was gentle on my skin and didn’t cause any sort of negative reactions.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: False advertising! Has sodium laureth sulfate
customer_reviews.text: Horrible case of false advertising. This product brags about being all natural and specifically says they do not use sulfates including sodium laureth sulfate. However, when the product arrived sodium laureth sulfate was the second ingredient. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: ALL

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: I made a good purchased when I bought this. It works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will never use another body wash
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing for my whole family. We have various skin issues from execma, sensitivity, allergies and psoriasis. This works for everyone and we love the smell!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product. I usually just reach for the usual over the counter body washes. My skin was starting to dry out more consistently but after using this product, I no longer have that issue. Definitely worth trying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great on skin
customer_reviews.text: scent could be change better scent.Not much suds but does leave skin great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduced itching.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bath and body wash to try if it will helps reduced itching caused by fungi, yes it does in the meantime until the doctor prescribed us medication. The smell is not bad actually I love the smell, used it all over the body as it is a body wash.
customer_reviews.author: AngeMou

customer_reviews.title: I like it but........
customer_reviews.text: Good smell, easy on skin but a bit too sudsy.
customer_reviews.author: Twinkle Toes

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey when others worked, just less lather
customer_reviews.text: Returning to arts bc loved the clean feel and lather, just wish you got more bang for buck
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best skin care products I’ve ever used. Give a clean fresh feeling with no residue and smells fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: no name

product_meta.title: ArtNaturals Tea Tree Body and Foot Wash - (12 Fl Oz / 355ml) - Peppermint and Eucalyptus Oil - Natural Anti-Bacterial Soap - Eczema Anti-Fungal Feet, Dry Skin, Jock Itch, Acne Athletes Foot Treatment
feature_bullets: ANTIFUNGAL - ArtNaturals Tea Tree Body and Foot Wash is created especially for skin. It deep-cleans, softens renews and refreshes and deodorizes and heals with its natural antiseptic, anti-germ, and anti-fungal properties.

IRRESISTIBLE SCENT – ArtNaturals Tea Tree Body Wash blends the scents of tea tree, peppermint and eucalyptus and other essential oils for a scent that can not be resisted. It masters the laws of attraction, embodying strength by setting itself apart making it more than just a body wash.

NATURAL BODY WASH – ArtNaturals Foot Body Wash is made with premium-quality botanical ingredients, and is paraben, cruelty, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS free. Perfect for anyone with an active lifestyle, and gentle enough for children older than age 3 as well, ArtNaturals Tea Tree Body Wash is a must-have for athletes, gym enthusiasts and those with a physical job.

CLEANSING AND MOISTURIZING – Leaves you super-clean, refreshed and ready to go. Its natural botanical ingredients, combined with essential oil extracts, deep clean, condition, and protect skin. Athlete’s foot, jock itch, and psoriasis can result, causing itchy, dry, and inflamed skin. Tea Tree Body Wash gives you all-natural cleansing for rapid relief, as well as protection against more germs and fungi.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - ArtNaturals offers a 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back. Try it risk free with no questions asked and top customer service. You have nothing to lose and your health to gain.
